title: We may be able to help you rent an apartment home!
posting_body: ['See better photos and', 'SCHEDULE A SHOWING', 'at:', '<URL>', "No, it's not a hyperlink.", ' :-(  You still have to copy-and-paste this link into the address bar on your web browser.', 'We may be able to help you rent an apartment home.', '16000 West Nine Mile Rd - 100, Southfield, MI, 48075', '$1364 per month', '2 beds, 2 full baths', '950 sq.', 'ft.', 'Schedule a call to discuss Immediate Availability', 'Must gross 4x rent per month in income with an acceptable background.', 'Resident Sponsor', '.We give people with a hic-up in their life’s journey an opportunity to start over again.', 'Second Chance', '- We all know someone who deserves a second chance and we love being part of their rebound.', 'Desired Home', '-We enable an applicant the ability to live in a Desired Home that may be close to their employment and/or school district, etc.', 'Repair Your Credit', '- Low Credit Rents will help you repair your credit if you complete your lease.', 'Onward to better living!', 'Utilities and Extras', '.', 'Parking available', '.', 'Laundry in unit', 'Amenities and Services', '.', 'On-site manager', '.', 'Sauna', '.', 'Spa', '.', 'Fitness center', '.', 'Bike room', '.', 'Business center', '.', 'Storage unit', '.', 'Media room / clubhouse', '.', 'Grill / barbecue', '.', 'Full service', '.', 'Private dog run/park', '.', 'Dry cleaner on site', '.', 'Private party room', '.', 'Coffee service', 'Contact Us:', 'Innovative Apartment Group', 'Mike Sun', 'show contact info', 'See better photos and', 'SCHEDULE A SHOWING', 'at:', '<URL>']
